promqlQuery.value: sum by(type) (rate(checkly_browser_check_web_vitals_seconds_sum{name=~"{{ checkname }}"}[15m])) / sum by(type) (rate(checkly_browser_check_web_vitals_seconds_count{name=~"{{ checkname }}"}[15m]))

dataprimeQuery.text:
source spans
| filter $l.serviceName != null
| groupby $l.serviceName, $m.timestamp / 1m as timestamp agg avg($m.duration) as avg_duration
